hadiths.text: Narrated `Abbad bin Tamim's uncle:The Prophet (ﷺ) went out to offer the Istisqa' prayer and turned (and put on) his cloak inside out

chapter.ara-name: باب الاِسْتِسْقَاءِ وَخُرُوجِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم فِي الاِسْتِسْقَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: Going out of the Prophet (ﷺ) to offer Istisqa' prayer
